  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Targets should implement this method to assign a section to globals with an explicit section specfied.

The implementation of this method can assume that GO-&gt;hasSection() is true.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armtargetobjectfile-h/#l00046">46</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armtargetobjectfile-h">ARMTargetObjectFile.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armtargetobjectfile-cpp/#l00103">103</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armtargetobjectfile-cpp">ARMTargetObjectFile.cpp</a>.

### Initialize() {#ad60d0495301b78e11523def2cb8b2b59}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void ARMElfTargetObjectFile::Initialize (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mccontext">MCContext</a> &amp; ctx, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetmachine">TargetMachine</a> &amp; TM)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
This method must be called before any actual lowering is done.

Initialize - this method must be called before any actual lowering is done.

This specifies the current context for codegen, and gives the lowering implementations a chance to set up their default sections.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armtargetobjectfile-h/#l00025">25</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armtargetobjectfile-h">ARMTargetObjectFile.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armtargetobjectfile-cpp/#l00031">31</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armtargetobjectfile-cpp">ARMTargetObjectFile.cpp</a>.
